# tingle

---

这是一个 Tingle All in One 的版本。

## 包括以下组件

- tingle-button
- tingle-city-field
- tingle-city-picker
- tingle-dialog
- tingle-field
- tingle-group-list
- tingle-icon
- tingle-layer
- tingle-load-more
- tingle-mask
- tingle-number-field
- tingle-on-off
- tingle-on-off-field
- tingle-photo-field
- tingle-picker
- tingle-scroller
- tingle-search-bar
- tingle-select-field
- tingle-slide
- tingle-slot
- tingle-tab
- tingle-textarea-field
- tingle-text-field
- tingle-tip

## 打包脚本

```
gulp
```
